title: Compensation Analytics at Netflix
text: Netflix uses analytics to determine employee compensation packages. By analyzing HR data such as market benchmarks, employee performance etc.

title: Succession Planning at AT&T
text: AT&T uses analytics to identify high-potential employees and develop them for future leadership roles. By analyzing HR data such as performance metrics, skills etc.
cta: Enhanced leadership pipeline, improved talent retention.

title: Performance Management at Deloitte
text: Deloitte uses a data-driven approach to performance management. The company utilizes analytics to measure employee performance and more.
cta: Improved employee performance, enhanced feedback quality.
